alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and west central Pennington Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1027 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nemo, or 13 miles south of Sturgis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Summerset and Piedmont around 1035 PM MDT. Black Hawk around 1040 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base and northwestern Box Elder. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 41 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
